about.title: About
about.description: Hi there, my name is Jonathan and i'm Full Stack developer, i have more than 4 years experience in development. I do always exploring news technologies, exploring yours potentials in development a products. I'm a person that accept always chalengens, exploring quality of the work. In my free time, i usually go to the gym or i’m studying a new language or a new technologie. I did develope this web site using React. If you wish see my codes, I do invite you visit my github.
